sentence: Europe' S unauthorized immigrant total
peaked in 2016 before leveling off
Range for the estimated number of unauthorized
immigrants in millions living in Europe, 2014-2017
4.8 million
High estimate
3.9 million
Low estimate
Note: Estimates are of unauthorized including immigrants living in all
European Union countries (28, including the UK) and four European
Free European Trade Association countries including (Iceland, Liechtenstein, Norway European
and Switzerland) combined. All numbers are rounded; see
Methodology for rounding rules. The total number of unauthorized
immigrants includes asylum seekers waiting for a decision on their
case. Low and methodological high estimates indicate the range of estimates based
on various methodological approaches.
Source: Pew Research Center estimates based on Eurostat and
European labor force survey data.
"Europe" 's Unauthorized Immigrant Population Peaks in 2016, Then
Levels Off"
PEW RESEARCH CENTER
